outputs.output_descr: Project Activvity to develop agency for Reducing Emission from Deforestation and Forest Degradation (REDD+) Agency development.

The project document was revised to reflect a change in the implementation arrangements for the "Support to the Establishment of Indonesia REDD+ Infrastructure and Capacity project" signed on 1 December 2010.
Pursuant to a decision by the President of Republic of Indonesia, and following of the formal exchange of letters between the President's Delivery Unit for Development Monitoring and Oversight  (UKP4), and BAPPENAS, and UNDP, and BAPPENAS, the Implementing Partner for the REDD+ project has been changed from the "REDD+ Taskforce" to UKP4. In line with this, any and all references to the "REDD+ Taskforce"  serving in the capacity of the Implementing Partnefrs in the project document signed on 1 December 2010 and amended on 19 May 2011, has now been changed to the "President's Delivery Unit for Development Monitoring and Oversight." All other substantive, programmatic, operational and implementation arrangement remain unaltered and as stated in the revised project document of 19 May 2011.
Under this revision, the budget and implementation timeframe of the project also remain as stated in the 19 May 2011 revised project document.

project_descr: This project is designed to support the task force in the preparatory work for strengthening the REDD+ (reducing emissions from deforestation and forest degradation) readiness and its infrastructures.
project_title: Support to the Establishment of Indonesia REDD+
